definitions.definition: To disturb, stir up, agitate (a medium, especially water).
To mentally distress; to cause (someone) to be anxious or perplexed.
definitions.example: What she said about narcissism is troubling me.

definitions.definition: In weaker sense: to bother or inconvenience.
definitions.example: I will not trouble you to deliver the letter.

definitions.definition: To take pains to do something.
definitions.example: I won't trouble to post the letter today; I can do it tomorrow.
